input.sentences: she went to her friend 's party to drink some more .
beifong 's friend was the most intoxicated .
she got everyone else equally drunk .
some of her friends had to hide from her .
output.sentences: She'd go out with a good friend, she'd love to party, and always had a drink in her hand.
Beifong met a friend at the party, but couldn't remember his name because she was intoxicated.
They both decided to hide from the rest of their friends.
